required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial on the Effectiveness of Citrolive
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Trial on the Effectiveness of Citrolive® to Decrease Oxidation of Low Density Lipoproteins

lead_sponsor.agency: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia

clinical_study.source: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia

brief_summary.textblock: The clinical trial consists in checking the antioxidant effect of citrolive on low density cholesterol.

detailed_description.textblock:
The clinical trial consists in checking the antioxidant effect of citrolive on low density cholesterol. To do this, volunteers consume the product under study or placebo for three months.
Tests will be performed before and after ingestion of the product.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: The change in systolic and diastolic blood pressure is observed after three months of intake of the product under investigation
primary_outcome.description: The systolic and diastolic blood pressure was measured with an OMRON oscilimétrilo sphygmomanometer

primary_outcome.time_frame: The change is observed after three months of intake of the product under investigation
primary_outcome.description: the hematological profile is analyzed with the Horiba ABX Oentra 80 analyzer. Biochemical profile with the ILAB 600 analyzer

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The change is observed after three months of intake of the product under investigation
The change is observed after three months of intake of the product under investigation
The change is observed after three months of intake of the product under investigation
secondary_outcome.description: Weight and height are combined for BMI report in kg / m ^ 2

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The change is observed after three months of intake of the product under investigation
secondary_outcome.description: Measured in cm. Waist, hip, waist / hip index, relaxed biceps, contracted biceps, medial thigh, twin or calf. Folds (mm) (tricipítal, subscapular, suprailiac anterior or supraspinal, abdominal, quadricipital or thigh, leg or calf medial, bicipital, iliocrestal). Diameters (cm) (radiocubital or wrist biestiloid, humeral or elbow bicpicondiolo, femoral or knee bicondiol).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The change is observed after three months of intake of the product under investigation
secondary_outcome.description: Measured in mm. Tricipítal, subscapular, suprailiac anterior or supraspinal, abdominal, quadricipital or thigh, leg or calf medial, bicipital, iliocrestal. Diameters (cm) (radiocubital or wrist biestiloid, humeral or elbow bicpicondiolo, femoral or knee bicondiol).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The change is observed after three months of intake of the product under investigation
secondary_outcome.description: Measured in cm. Radiocubital or wrist biestiloid, humeral or elbow bicpicondiolo, femoral or knee bicondiol.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measurements are made at the beginning and after 90 days of product consumption.
secondary_outcome.description: Volunteers record dietary intake for three days in a notebook. They will describe the amount of food they consume in grams in order to assess changes in intake during the clinical trial.

arm_group.description: volunteers consume 1 capsule per day for 3 months. (500 mg citrolive).
volunteers consume 1 capsule per day for 3 months. (saccharose).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Not belonging to the group of individuals considered as priorities by the Third Joint Task Force for the prevention of cardiovascular diseases due to high risk.
2. Present total cholesterol figures greater than 200 milligrams / deciliter and / or low density cholesterol figures greater than 130 milligrams / deciliter so that after applying the cardiovascular risk table (SCORE) they present a current risk of less than 5% of suffer an ischemic event in a period of 10 years, being without pharmacological treatment.
3. Present several cardiovascular risk factors with cholesterolemia figures close to 200 milligrams / deciliters and / or low density cholesterol figures close to 130 milligrams / deciliters.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. chronic or terminal illness.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia
